entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times late this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 28 April 2023
